title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the justification

g ′ ( x )= e f( x ) f ′ ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGabm4zayaafa WaaeWaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyypa0JaamyzamaaCaaa leqabaGaamOzamaabmaabaGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaakiqadA gagaqbamaabmaabaGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaa@4289@

e f( x ) >0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamyzamaaCa aaleqabaGaamOzamaabmaabaGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaakiab g6da+iaaicdaaaa@3C4A@ for all x

So, g' changes from positive to negative only when f' changes from positive to negative. This occurs at x = -1 only. Thus, g has a local maximum at x = -1.

stimulusHtml:

g ″ ( −1 )= e f( −1 ) [ ( f ′ ( −1 ) ) 2 + f ″ ( −1 ) ] e f( −1 ) >0 and  f ′ ( −1 )=0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaaceWGNb GbayaadaqadaqaaiabgkHiTiaaigdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqp caWGLbWaaWbaaSqabeaacaWGMbWaaeWaaeaacqGHsislcaaIXaaaca GLOaGaayzkaaaaaOWaamWaaeaadaqadaqaaiqadAgagaqbamaabmaa baGaeyOeI0IaaGymaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaGaayjkaiaawMcaamaaCa aaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRiqadAgagaGbamaabmaabaGaeyOe I0IaaGymaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaGaay5waiaaw2faaaqaaiaadwgada ahaaWcbeqaaiaadAgadaqadaqaaiabgkHiTiaaigdaaiaawIcacaGL PaaaaaGccqGH+aGpcaaIWaGaaeiiaiaabggacaqGUbGaaeizaiaabc caceWGMbGbauaadaqadaqaaiabgkHiTiaaigdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaa cqGH9aqpcaaIWaaaaaa@5EF4@

Since f' is decreasing on a neighborhood of -1, f''(-1) < 0. Therefore, g''(-1) < 0.
